body.name: Ben Sherman Hereford Spinner Travel Upright Luggage, Burgundy, 20-Inch Carry On
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 8 hrs 19 mins
features: 4-wheel spinners that allow for 360-degree rotation, expands an extra 2.0 inches
Durable ABS hard-shell exterior, top handle
Fully lined, rip-proof interior with a stylish modern pattern
body.description: Pack your essentials for an overnight trip or a weekend getaway Inside this durable, hardside 4-wheel spinner 20" Carry on-size suitcase from Ben Sherman "Hereford" Luggage collection. 4-wheel spinners that allow for 360-degree rotation, expands an extra 2.0 inches Lightweight construction. Durable ABS hard-shell exterior, top handle Telescoping trolley handle Fully lined, rip-proof interior with a stylish modern pattern The main compartment in the interior features clothing compression straps to keep your belongings organized and a hanging zipper pocket for personal belongings Side handles and side feet on 24 and 28inch luggage Front lid features a U-shaped zipper panel for double-sided packing and a full-length mesh zipper pocket This hard-side carry-on size meets most U.S based airline carry-on size requirements and fits in most airline overhead bin compartments 10-year limited warranty

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice looking meets flight reqs
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a large case that can go on most flights. Those were my main requirements but aesthetics are a bonus and quality is definitely desired as the options are all $100 give or take. This case seems to meet the criteria for me and I got it for $89. The dimensions add up to 59 inches without the expandable part which would add 2 inches. According to Google flights will accept 62 inches in most cases so this case should work. The case is super light but seems reasonably sturdy. Feature’s look good so far. The only question will be durability but hopefully with an established brand like this and normal wear this will hold up well. These things with the 4 wheels are a lifesaver in the airport. I used a large duffel bag before which was a bad idea because although I am in good shape the bag wears on you when you are walking the airport and carrying for hours potentially. Overall it appears solid. I will edit if anything changes when I use it.Edit post international trip: It was great for the first trip. Got it through American Airlines checked process no problem. Lightweight helps so that you can pack a few things. I usually pack shoes because I do outdoor activities. Love that you can close the zipper towards the top and I can put on my travel lock there so it’s easy to access. Lots of space inside for your stuff. Wheels and handles and all held up for the trip. It picked up some scuffs as the grey color is pretty light but that’s to be expected. For the price so far it’s excellent value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A simple but solid hard sided suitcase. It is very roomy. My partner and I shared it for a week long beach trip and still had room. When I have used it alone for work trips I put all of my clothing in the zip side and leave the other half basically empty for bringing things back. The only thing to remember is it’s big and does not really compact in any way for storage but that’s sort of the trade off with hard luggage. All in all I am pleased with this bag and think it’s a good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value and pretty sturdy
reviews.reviewText: At first it seemed cheaply made but I used it anyway as I didn’t have time to return. I packed it to the nines and literally dragged this suitcase through dirt and rocks while at 2 different women’s retreats and was surprised at how it held up. The wheels could be a bit better (more rotation) but it totally works still even after what I put it through!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars White not a great color
reviews.reviewText: This luggage is very roomy. So much that i may have exceeded the 50 lb checked bag limit by a smidge. White was not the greatest color to choose though. After one trip it is clearly used and scuffed pretty bad. There is a small rip in the area where the zipper is but nothing major. As i did load down this suitcase there were times it was a little difficult to maneuver, but overall it worked just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made very nice
reviews.reviewText: Pretty color and well built. Put stickers on it and it shines! Love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Zipper Separated from Frame after 1 Flight
reviews.reviewText: Really liked the color and size of this bag which seemed very sturdy, however, the zipper broke after 1 flight. The bag was not overpacked nor was the bag extended. This was a gift for my granddaughter for her summer travels and we are so disappointed in the quality.UPDATE. I used the warranty and the manufacturer sent me a new one! Hopefully it holds up better!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just my size.
reviews.reviewText: I needed something with enough space for all my stuff but easy to lift and roll. This suitcase is perfect for me. I would like for the lining to not feel like a stiff parachute material but I think all suitcases have this now. All the other features like the zipper, rollers, handles are very sturdy and the hardshell outside hasn't been scratched. I bought it during a great sale and it arrived quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I haven't used them yet but they look great!
Received this and took it to the Dominican the following week. So easy to spot on the luggae rack. Tons of room inside

reviews.reviewTitle: No aclaran si es una o dos maletas
reviews.reviewText: En la descripción de la venta mencionan dos artículos uno de 20 y otro de 24 y solo entregan el de 20. Se les pregunta y no dan respuesta. Me gusta la marca pero poco servicio brindan.
